attributes.action: Step down and call an election if this petition reaches 1 million signatories as it will be deemed a vote of no confidence in his government.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We require a free and fair vote to elect a leader as is the case in every democratic country. Gordon Bown and Labour are past the sell by date for usefulness and we must get them out to start the UK economy again. Therefore I would ask you all to sign this petition of no confidence so that we have a chance to vote who leads us.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
